font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vt. 延长，拖长： to draw out or lengthen in time; prolong
【近】 prolong, elongate, lengthen, stretch, drag out, draw out,
【反】 curtail, abridge, abbreviate, shorten, cut back 缩减
【记】 pro前 + tract 拖，拉；tractor 拖拉机
